```{r, include = FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  comment = "#>"
)
```

```{r}
library(caracas)
```

```{r, include = FALSE}
if (!have_sympy()) {
  # SymPy not available, so the chunks shall not be evaluated
  knitr::opts_chunk$set(eval = FALSE)
}
```


### Printing

```{r}
x <- symbol('x')
x
```
